screen_desc: The screenshot shows the "System" settings menu of an Android smartphone. It includes options for "Languages & input" (set to Gboard), "Gestures," "Date & time" (set to GMT-07:00 Pacific Daylight Time), and "Backup" (currently off). There is also an "Advanced" section with options like "Reset options" and "System update." The screen allows users to configure system-related settings.
history_actions: click on the Settings icon located at the upper left.
click on the "System" option located at the middle-lower part of the screen.

think_action.Thought: The user has requested to change the appearance of the keyboard. The current screen shows the 'System' settings menu, with an option for 'Languages & input' that may allow us to modify the keyboard settings. Since 'Languages & input' is set to Gboard, the next step is to click on 'Languages & input' to explore the keyboard settings and change its appearance.
Future Action Plan: Click on 'Languages & input' to access the keyboard settings.
Explore the available options within Gboard to change its appearance.
Modify the keyboard look as per the user's preference.
